SA11sanss12u:348_0: hanantu kleśān vidhamantu duṣkhān samentu rāgaṃ tatha doṣa moham //
SA11sanss12u:350_0: śṛṇvantu te dundubhisaṃpravāditaṃ namo 'stu buddhāya bhaṇantu vācam //
SA11sanss12u:351_0: jātismarāḥ satvā bhavantu sarve jātīśataṃ jātisahasrakoṭyaḥ /
SA11sanss12u:352_0: anusmarantū satataṃ munîndrān śṛṇvantu teṣāṃ vacanaṃ hy udāraṃ //
SA11sanss12u:353_0: anena cô dundubhighoṣanādinā labhantu buddhehi samāgamaṃ sadā /
SA11sanss12u:354_0: vivarjayantū khalu pāpakarma carantu kuśalāni śubhakriyāṇi /
SA11sanss12u:354_1: /sarvatra kṣetreṣu ca sarvaprāṇināṃ sarve ca duṣkhāḥ praśamantu loke /
SA11sanss12u:355_0: ye satva vikalêndriyâṅgahīnāḥ te sarvi sakalêndriya bhontu sāṃpratam //
SA11sanss12u:356_0: ye vyādhitā durbalakṣīṇagātrā nistrāṇabhūtāḥ śayitā diśāsu /
SA11sanss12u:357_0: te sarvi mucyantu ca vyādhito laghu labhantu cârogya balêndriyāṇi //
SA11sanss12u:358_0: ye rājacaurabhaṭa tarjita vadhyaprāptā nānāvidhair bhayaśatair vyasanôpapannāḥ /
SA11sanss12u:361_0: rvi satva vyasanâgataduṣkhitā hi mucyantu tair bhayaśataiḥ paramaiḥ sughoraiḥ //
SA11sanss12u:363_0: ye tāḍitā bandhanabaddhapīḍitā vividheṣu vyasaneṣu ca saṃsthitāhi /
SA11sanss12u:364_1: / te sarvi mucyantv iha bandhanebhyaḥ saṃtāḍitā mucyiṣu tāḍanebhyaḥ /
SA11sanss12u:365_0: vadhyāś ca saṃyujyiṣu jīvitena vyasanâgatā nirbhaya bhontu sarve /
SA11sanss12u:366_0: andhāś ca paśyantu vicitrarūpāṃ badhirāś ca śṛṇvantu manojñaghoṣān /
SA11sanss12u:366_1: /nagnāś ca vastrāṇi labhantu citrāṃ daridrasatvāś ca nidhiṃ labhantu /
SA11sanss12u:367_0: prabhūtadhanadhānyavicitraratnaiḥ sarve ca satvāḥ sukhino bhavantu /
SA11sanss12u:367_1: /mā kasyacid bhāvatu duṣkhavedanāḥ saukhyânvitāḥ satva bhavantu sarve /
SA11sanss12u:369_0: vīṇā mṛdaṅgāḥ paṇavāḥ sughoṣakāḥ utsā sarāḥ puṣkariṇī taḍāgāḥ //
SA11sanss12u:370_0: suvarṇapadmôtpalapadminīś ca saha cittamātreṇa bhavantu teṣām /
SA11sanss12u:371_0: gandhaṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vilepanaṃ ca vāsaś ca cūrṇaṃ kusumaṃ vicitram /
SA11sanss12u:371_1: /triṣkālavṛkṣebhi pravarṣayantu gṛhṇantu te satva bhavantu hṛṣṭāḥ /
SA11sanss12u:372_0: kurvantu pūjāṃ daśasū diśāsu acintiyāṃ sarvatathāgatānām //
SA11sanss12u:374_0: sa bodhisatvān atha śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmasya bodhi pratisṛṣṭi tasya /
SA11sanss12u:375_0: nīcāṃ gatiṃ satva vivarjayantu bhavantu aṣṭâkṣaṇavītivṛttāḥ //
SA11sanss12u:376_0: āsādayantū jinarājam uttamaṃ labhantu buddhehi samāgamaṃ sadā /
SA11sanss12u:377_0: sarvā striyo nitya narā bhavantu śūrāś ca vīrā vidupaṇḍitāś ca /
SA11sanss12u:377_1: /te sarvi bodhāya carantu nityaṃ carantu te pāramitāsu ṣaṭsu /
SA11sanss12u:378_0: paśyantu buddhān daśasū diśāsu ratnadrumêndreṣu sukhôpaviṣṭān /
SA11sanss12u:390_0: yad idam avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvaj jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇam iti /
SA11sanss12u:391_0: avidyā cen nâbhaviṣyan nâiva saṃskārāḥ prājñāsyanta /
SA11sanss12u:392_0: evaṃ yāvad yadi jātir nâbhaviṣyan na jarāmaraṇaṃ prājñāsyata /
SA11sanss12u:393_0: atha satyām avidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇām abhinirvṛttir bhavati /
SA11sanss12u:394_0: evaṃ yāvaj jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyâbhinirvṛttir bhavati /
SA11sanss12u:402_0: ahaṃ jātyā nirvṛttêti /atha ca satyām avidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇām abhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA11sanss12u:403_0: evaṃ yāvaj jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyâbhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ //
SA11sanss12u:407_0: yad idaṃ pṛthivy-aptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyād ādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayôpanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA11sanss12u:408_0: yo 'yaṃ kāyasya saṃśleṣataḥ kaṭhinabhāvam abhinirvartayaty ayam ucyate pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
SA11sanss12u:409_0: yaḥ kāyasyânuparigrahaṃ kṛtyaṃ karoti ayam ucyate 'bdhātuḥ /
SA11sanss12u:410_0: yaḥ kāyasyâśitapītabhakṣitaṃ paripācayati ayam ucyate tejodhātuḥ /
SA11sanss12u:414_0: yaḥ kāyasyântaḥsauṣiryabhāvam abhinirvartayaty ayam ucyate ākāśadhātuḥ /
SA11sanss12u:415_0: yo nāmarūpam abhinirvartayati naḍakalāpayogena pañcavijñānakāyasaṃprayuktaṃ sâsravaṃ ca manovijñānam ayam ucyate vijñānadhātuḥ /
SA11sanss12u:417_0: yadâdhyātmikaḥ pṛthivīdhātur avikalo bhavaty evam aptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātavaś câvikalā bhavanti /
SA11sanss12u:433_0: atha ca satsv eṣu pratyayeṣu kāyasyôtpattir bhavati /
SA11sanss12u:434_0: tatra pṛthivīdhātur nâtmā na satvo na jīvo na jantur na manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ /
SA11sanss12u:438_0_0: evam abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātur na satvo na jīvo na
SA11sanss12u:438_0_1: jantur na manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na câhaṃ na mama na câpy
SA11sanss12u:439_0: yâiṣv eva ṣaṭsu dhātuṣv ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñâtmasaṃjñā satvajīvamanujamānavasaṃjñā /
SA11sanss12u:444_0: evam avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ viṣayeṣu rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante /
SA11sanss12u:445_0: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣv amī ucyante saṃskārêti /
SA11sanss12u:448_0: catvāri ca mahābhūtāni côpādāyôpādāya r ūpam aikadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya tan nāmarūpaṃ /
SA11sanss12u:464_0: punar aparaṃ tatve 'pratipattiḥ mithyā pratipattiḥ ajñānam avidyā /
SA11sanss12u:471_0: puṇyôpagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyôpagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss12u:472_0: apuṇyôpagānāṃ saṃskārāṇām apuṇyôpagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss12u:473_0: āniñjyôpagānāṃ saṃskārāṇām āniñjyôpagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss12u:478_0: ṣaḍbhyâyatanebhyaḥ ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ pravartante 'yaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśêty ucyate /
SA11sanss12u:479_0: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
SA11sanss12u:485_0: mā me priyarūpaśātarūpair viyogo bhavatv iti /
SA11sanss12u:488_0: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā /
SA11sanss12u:490_0: yā karmanirjātānāṃ skandhānām abhinirvṛttiḥ sā bhavapratyayā jātir ity ucyate /
SA11sanss12u:491_0: yo jātyabhinirvṛttānāṃ skandhānām upacayaparipākād vināśo bhavati /
SA11sanss12u:503_0: atha cêmāny asya dvādaśâṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāri aṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante /
SA11sanss12u:514_0: asatāṃ yeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ bījasyâbhinirvṛttir na bhavati //tatra karmaṇo nâivaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss12u:519_0: vijñānabījasyâpi nâivaṃ bhavaty aham ebhiḥ pratyayair janitêti /
SA11sanss12u:526_0: sa ca nāmarūpâṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nôbhayakṛto nêśvarâdinirmito na kālapariṇāmito na câikakāraṇâdhīno nâpy ahetusamutpannaḥ /
SA11sanss12u:527_0: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogād ṛtusamavāyād anyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyād āsvādânupraviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpâṅkurabījam abhinirvartayati /
SA11sanss12u:528_0: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣv amameṣv aparigraheṣv apratyarthikeṣv ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānām avaikalyāt /
SA11sanss12u:529_0: tad yathā pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiś cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate /
SA11sanss12u:531_0: cakṣuś ca pratītya rūpaṃ câlokaṃ câkāśaṃ tajjaṃ ca manasikāraṃ ca pratītyôtpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ /
SA11sanss12u:538_0: yadā cakṣur ādhyātmikam āyatanam avikalaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss12u:553_0: atha ca punaḥ satsv eṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyôtpattir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA11sanss12u:555_0: tatra na kaścid dharmo 'smāl lokāt paraṃ lokaṃ saṃkrāmati /
SA11sanss12u:563_0: evam eva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatra tatrôtpattyāyatanapratisandhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpâṅkuram abhinirvartayati /
SA11sanss12u:564_0: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣv amameṣv aparigraheṣv apratyarthikeṣv ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānām avaikalyāt /
SA11sanss12u:565_0: tan nâdhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇair draṣṭavyaḥ //
SA11sanss12u:571_0: na tu yae eva māraṇântikāḥ skandhās tae evâupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhā /
SA11sanss12u:572_0: api tu māraṇântikāś ca skandhā nirudhyamānâupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāś ca prādurbhavanti /
SA11sanss12u:575_0: na ca niruddheṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti nâpy aniruddheṣu /
SA11sanss12u:576_0: api tu māraṇântikāś ca skandhā nirudhyante 'upapattyaṃśikāś ca prādurbhavanti /
SA11sanss12u:580_0: visadṛśāt satvanikāyād dhi sabhāgāḥ skandhā jātyantare 'bhinirvartante /
SA11sanss12u:591_0_0: yaḥ kaścid bhadanta śāriputrêmaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ bhagavatā samyakpraṇītam evaṃ
SA11sanss12u:591_0_1: yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitam ajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvad aviparītam ajātam
SA11sanss12u:591_0_2: abhūtam akṛtam asaṃskṛtam apratigham anāvaraṇaṃ śivam abhayam ahāryam avyayam avyupaśamam
SA11sanss12u:592_0: asatyatas tucchata ṛktato 'sārato 'ghato 'nityato duṣkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmanaś ca samanupaśyati /
SA11sanss12u:594_0: kim aham abhūvam atīte 'dhvany āho svin nâbhūvam atīte 'dhvani /
SA11sanss12u:597_0: kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmy anāgate 'dhvany āho svin na bhaviṣyāmy anāgate 'dhvani /
SA11sanss12u:599_1: kiṃ svid idaṃ kathaṃ svid idaṃ /
SA11sanss12u:620_0: hanta vayam evaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ viditvâsya saṃyogasyâsyāś ca sāmagryā vyavacchedaṃ kariṣyāmo /
